title: Okay so these Sej nerfs...
body:
...are not all that bad. If you think about it, she was good before 5.6, I loved playing her in 5.5, and now with Cinderhulk the problem is not that "oh man a tank is really good we gotta nerf her". I think the issue is that Sejuani (to me personally) is much better than the *other* tank junglers. I say this not only based off win rate, or by popularity, but because now her clear is good, her presence is amazing, and because her ganks are phenomenal for 2 reasons. 
1. A typical gank would have her Q in, W, and then E. The thing with Sej is even if you miss your Q, you're still on top of the enemy (unless maybe they flashed), and can still w, e, making extremely easy for lanes to kill the enemy. 
2. When I play sej i start top side buff and lvl 2 gank top lane, 100% of the time get their flash or they die, but this is because i always tell top not to push and that I'm going to gank early so top knows to trade with them from the start. Getting early flashes makes for very easy follows up since there is almost no other way to get away from her. 
Honestly, I'm sad to see the nerf, I've been loving winning with her, but it's easy, and I think the nerf was deserved. I'm actually surprised they didn't nerf the slow on her E, instead they buffed the damage. I think the rage at Riot is for no reason, Vi was still nerfed, J4 is not as good of a tank at Sej/Naut/Cho/rammus, and now rammus is even suppose to get a buff! I think it's a fun time to be a jungler, there has been a lot changing this season already, and i think its fun to get to try new things each patch. Personally, my hat is going off to Riot.

I love the level 2 gank with Sej, but it shows exactly why Sejuani's win rate is so high.

If you are jungling against a sejuani, she takes the frog, and you kill her at blue.

If she goes top, you take her red and set her a mile behind.

But people don't exploit her weakness- being counter jungled, so she stays strong

My problem is that the nerf does not have much to do with what tipped her over the edge. Like, her ult's nerf doesn't make sense. I get the whole "you should be punished if you miss it" (so tired of people saying that and calling me bad when I'm talking about what comes next) deal, but I'm going to miss the *teamfighting utility* where you throw it at the condensed group, stunning one person while slowing the rest down considerably. 

But the utility of her ult has nothing to do with the increased damage of her W, which is the only thing that changed with cinderhulk. Her *E* spell slows more than her ult now.

Ult nerf makes perfect sense friend.

They punish the sejuani's who wiff.

I clearly just said I have nothing against being punished for the whole whiffing business... and talked about teamfighting utility, which I'm worried about.

I can't really think of a even remotely common situation where you won't either chain stun at least 3 or a carry+1, or miss completely......like shit you'd probably have to be TRYING to hit only 1 person........

^If this isn't the issue you're going to have to be very clear on what aspect of "gutting the slow removes her teamfight utility" is an issue...it ideally shouldn't be slowing in the first place, should be FREEZING FOTHER MUCKERS SOLID!!!!!!!!!!

B) The bolas flies off in god knows what direction and wiffs entirely
